attributes.action: Increase wedding limits to 50 people for May
attributes.additional_details: A lot of people are upset as they cannot invite their loved one’s due to restrictions. People want to be allowed to invite more of their family members rather than minimum people
attributes.background: We want the government to increase the guest limits by 50 people for May as if gatherings are allowed for pubs etc why can wedding limits not go higher as they will be in the individual tables

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Weddings to be allowed from the 17th of May with a maximum of 150: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576593
